channel.title: Comments on: How to fit the best of Istanbul into four days

item.title: By: Francis Chin
item.dc:creator: Francis Chin
item.description: I read My Name Is Red by Turkish Nobel Prize for Literature writer Orhan Pamuk, where he depicts Istanbul with lots of characters drinking coffee nonstop in cafes and small restaurants. What are some of these cafes today? Thanks!
item.content:encoded: I read My Name Is Red by Turkish Nobel Prize for Literature writer Orhan Pamuk, where he depicts Istanbul with lots of characters drinking coffee nonstop in cafes and small restaurants. What are some of these cafes today? Thanks!

item.title: By: Sakina
item.dc:creator: Sakina
item.description: Thanks for sharing this! We're headed there in December for 4 days so your blog is a great find. So Sultanahmet and Beyoglu are the 2 must cover areas for a 4 day visit?
item.content:encoded: Thanks for sharing this! We’re headed there in December for 4 days so your blog is a great find. So Sultanahmet and Beyoglu are the 2 must cover areas for a 4 day visit?

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/falling-in-love-with-istanbul/#comment-77345">Hussain</a>.
Pleasure! Hope you have a wonderful stay in one of my favourite cities.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Hussain.

Pleasure! Hope you have a wonderful stay in one of my favourite cities.

item.title: By: Hussain
item.dc:creator: Hussain
item.description: I'll be there in June 2015 staying in Sultanhamet. Thanks for the tips and feedback. Cant wait.
item.content:encoded: I’ll be there in June 2015 staying in Sultanhamet. Thanks for the tips and feedback. Cant wait.

item.title: By: bugraguner
item.dc:creator: bugraguner
item.description: Great definition. We are waiting for everyone with Turkish hospitality.
item.content:encoded: Great definition. We are waiting for everyone with Turkish hospitality.

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/falling-in-love-with-istanbul/#comment-358">Paige Conner Totaro</a>.
There's so much to do in Istanbul it's hard to fit it into a few days. I would also love to go back for longer!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Paige Conner Totaro.

There’s so much to do in Istanbul it’s hard to fit it into a few days. I would also love to go back for longer!
